Shop

Florals

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ module_class=”first-on-mobile” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#D2D8BC” z_index=”440″ custom_padding=”79px|40px|88px|40px|false|true” custom_css_main_element=”margin-bottom: 20px!important;” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”margin-bottom: 20px!important;” custom_css_main_element_phone=”margin-bottom: 20px!important;”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#4A4850″ text_font_size=”50px” header_2_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_line_height=”0.5em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||30px||false|false” locked=”off”]

DIY Packages

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_font_size=”16px” link_font=”||||on||||” locked=”off”]

Shopping for wedding flowers CAN be empowering and fun. Our packages take away the guesswork and let you focus on the big picture; your vision, and vibe.

If you love our packages and want to tweak a bit, our bulk greenery and florals section is always available for you.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ module_class=”first-on-mobile” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _dynamic_attributes=”link_option_url” _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#D2D8BC” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(210,216,188,0.25)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(210,216,188,0.25)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://www.youfloral.ca/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/florist_calgary.jpg” custom_padding=”50px|40px|50px|40px|true|true” link_option_url=”@ET-DC@eyJkeW5hbWljIjp0cnVlLCJjb250ZW50IjoicG9zdF9saW5rX3VybF9wYWdlIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsicG9zdF9pZCI6IjMwMCJ9fQ==@” custom_css_main_element=”display: flex;||flex-direction: column;||justify-content: center;||background-size: 150%;||transition: all 0.8s ease;||margin-bottom: 20px!important;||border: 10px solid #c1c5af;” custom_css_main_element_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_css_main_element__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” custom_css_main_element__hover=”background-size: 165%;” custom_css_main_element_tablet=”background-size: cover;||margin-bottom: 20px!important;” custom_css_main_element_phone=”margin-bottom: 20px!important;||border-left: 10px solid #c1c5af;||border-right: 10px solid #c1c5af;||border-top: 10px solid #c1c5af;”][et_pb_text module_class=”blurred-container” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”||||||||” text_text_color=”#4A4850″ text_line_height=”1.2em” header_2_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_2_font_size=”50px” header_2_line_height=”0.5em” header_3_font=”Dancing Script|700|||||||” header_3_font_size=”35px” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”18px|10px|11px|10px|false|false” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” locked=”off”]
